flawed_nl_solution:
Since Will was 4 years old 3 years ago, then he is 4+3 = <<4+3=4>>4 years old now
Dina is twice as old as he is so she is 2*4 = <<2*4=8>>8 years old now
In 5 years, Will will be 4+5 = <<4+5=9>>9 years old
In 5 years, Diane will be 8+5 = 13 years old
The sum of their ages at that time will be 9+13 = <<9+13=22>>22 years
#### 22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 4. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
